proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is losing 500 hours a year writing proposals. Let's reclaim that time.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, KBD spends hours crafting each proposal manually. With our system, generate them in just 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every day, KBD faces significant ongoing losses due to inefficient proposal processes.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal consumes at least 5 hours. That's 500 hours a year lost, time not spent on client acquisition or campaign strategies.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed opportunities. Every 24 hours a proposal is late, the chance of closing decreases by 10%.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manual creation risks inconsistencies. Each mismatched proposal costs KBD credibility and trust, impacting client retention.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Labor for proposal writing adds up. At $50/hour, that's $25,000 annually just on creating proposals, not including revisions.

problems.title: Strategic Focus
problems.description: Time spent writing proposals detracts from strategic initiatives. Every hour lost is an hour not innovating or optimizing campaigns.

problems.title: Error Risk
problems.description: Manual errors are common. Each mistake can cost a client, with potential losses of $10,000 or more per error.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces the slow, error-prone manual process with rapid, precise proposal generation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system crafts them in under a minute, saving time and reducing labor costs.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual efforts lead to inconsistencies. The AI ensures every proposal is perfectly branded, every time.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual entries are prone to errors. Our AI checks and balances each proposal, minimizing costly mistakes.

solutions.title: Enhanced Focus
solutions.description: Currently, time is spent on writing. With AI, focus shifts to strategy and client engagement, enhancing business growth.

solutions.title: Opportunity Tracking
solutions.description: Proposals often go untracked. The system includes tracking, ensuring no opportunity slips through unnoticed.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Drive Revenue with KBD's Expert Marketing Solutions.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will strategize and execute a targeted marketing plan to increase your conversions and grow your brand.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant revenue loss due to underperforming marketing channels.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without purchasing is revenue walking out the door. This is costing you approximately $50,000 monthly.

problems.title: Poor Brand Visibility
problems.description: Limited online presence means missed opportunities. You are losing up to 30% of potential market share to competitors.

problems.title: Ineffective Ad Spend
problems.description: Spending on ads without optimized targeting results in wasted budget. An estimated $20,000 is being lost monthly.

problems.title: High Customer Churn
problems.description: Retention issues lead to continued loss of existing customers. This accounts for an estimated $10,000 monthly revenue loss.

problems.title: Underutilized Social Media
problems.description: Inconsistent social media engagement results in missed customer interactions, costing you potential growth in customer base.

problems.title: Lack of Data Insights
problems.description: Not utilizing data analytics leads to uninformed decisions, causing inefficiencies and a potential 25% loss in optimization opportunities.

proposal2.solutionIntro: KBD offers strategic solutions tailored to address these specific losses.

solutions.title: Conversion Optimization
solutions.description: We enhance your website to convert more visitors into customers, turning lost opportunities into revenue.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: Our team increases your brand visibility, capturing more market share and reducing competitor dominance.

solutions.title: Targeted Advertising
solutions.description: We refine your ad spend to focus on the right audience, maximizing return on investment.

solutions.title: Data Analytics
solutions.description: We provide actionable insights from your data, ensuring informed and strategic decision-making.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is your partner in driving measurable marketing success.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of delivering results in various industries with tailored strategies.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your business goals, ensuring our strategies align with your specific needs.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We use the latest tools and strategies to keep your brand ahead of the curve.

whyUsCards.title: Measured Success
whyUsCards.description: Our focus is on data-driven results, continually optimizing for the best outcomes.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team ready to drive your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads our strategic initiatives and client relationships, ensuring every project exceeds expectations.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We conduct an in-depth analysis of your current strategies and market positioning.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: Our team crafts a customized marketing strategy tailored to your needs.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We execute the strategy, optimizing for the best results.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: We assess performance metrics and refine strategies for continued growth.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment tier that aligns with your growth goals.

pricing.name: Basic
pricing.description: Ideal for startups and small businesses looking to establish a digital presence.

pricing.name: Standard
pricing.description: Our recommended package for growing businesses seeking comprehensive marketing solutions.

pricing.name: Premium
pricing.description: For enterprises aiming for market dominance with cutting-edge strategies.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can achieve your marketing goals. No commitment required.
